Yesterday I went there.

Todos los días yo iba al cine.
Every day I went to the movies.
I will go to the movies.
I would go to the beach.

Yo he ido a la playa.
I have gone to the beach.
(tú) You go to the movies.

De pronto tú fuiste al cine.
(tú) Suddenly you went to the movies.

Él me dijo que tú ibas allí.
(tú) He told me that you went there.
(tú) You will go to the beach.
(tú) You would go there.
(tú) You have gone there.
(usted) You go to the beach.

De repente ella fue a la playa.
Suddenly she went to the beach.

Todas las mañanas él iba a la playa.
Every morning he went to the beach.
She will go to the movies.
She would go to the movies.
She has gone to the movies.
We go to the beach.

De repente nosotros fuimos a la playa.
Suddenly we went to the beach.

Todos los años nosotros íbamos a la playa.
Every year we went to the beach.
We will go to the movies.
We would go to the beach.
We have gone to the movies.
(ellos) They go to the beach.

De pronto ellas fueron a la playa.
(ellas) Suddenly they went to the beach.

Todas las mañanas ustedes iban allí.
(ustedes) Every morning you all went there.
(ellos) They will go to the movies.
(ellos) They would go to the beach.
(ellas) They have gone there.
